issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: built locally, let's try a ptest

Any specific reasons not to update to the latest 9.4.x version ?
Since its a minor version change anyways, this can go in and we can separately look into upgrading to 9.4.x line as that may also include breaking changes. 

+1, post CI passes.
